name: BurgessBEARSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask Burgess Bear what is for lunch tomorrow?”
”Alexa, ask Burgess Bear what is tomorrow's special?”
”Alexa, ask Burgess Bear to add a student.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: burgess bear
des: Get customized feedback on your childs' schedule for a given school day. Find out what's on the lunch menu or when the last day of school is. Say "Add a student" and Alexa will prompt you for the child's first name and six-day class special schedule (art, music, gym, etc.). Then you can ask Alexa "what is tomorrow's special" or any other date, and Alexa will tell you what the special class your child has for that day. You can add multiple students to your account.
